title: Customer Service Practical Competency Enhancement: Social Problem-Solving Projects Through Learning from Failure

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social science concepts and problem analysis capabilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can systematically analyze failure cases to derive strategies for solving social issues.
Learners can reflect on three or more experimental failure experiences in a reflective journal and propose improvement measures.
Teams can design and execute social issue-solving projects, completing at least two prototype improvements

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
